availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Adam D. Caplinger (Carroll Co. KY. Blacksmith, Postmaster)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Adaline Teague Caplinger in 1845. Married to Eliza Ellen Sandifer Caplinger in 1856. Father of James F. Caplinger, Elizabeth F. Caplinger, Nancy E. Caplinger, Isadore M. Caplinger, and William K. Caplinger. Appointed Postmaster in Sandifer's Store, Carroll County, in 1856. Blacksmith in Carroll County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Mill Creek, District 1, p. 61.
